Package home.concurrency.danceFloor

Class DanceFloor

java.lang.Object
home.concurrency.danceFloor.DanceFloor
public class DanceFloor
extends java.lang.Object
handles the requests of the Gentleman dancing and moves around the Dames

    • dumpDame

      protected void dumpDame​(Dame dame)
      the gentleman dumps the dame when he reaches the crisis stage
      Parameters:
      dame - the dame that the gentleman was dancing with. The gentleman is fed up of dancing with that dame and later asks for a new one
